Dialogue Text: That's it...! This is the place I was talking about!
Hehe... As promised, I'll let you ask me anything!
Exactly what should I offer to that little girl?
Let's see... maybe this crystalball might te-
OOOOH! The creature beside you seems to have some sort of special connection to you!
...I should keep it with me all the more, isn't it?
No, not like that! Besides you, there's another one who has a connection to it too.
So go on and look for her again!
Bon Voyage my friend! Here's where we part ways.
Perhaps she might be the one, you can never be too sure.
